Package org.daisy.pipeline.job Description

Jobs are executable units which offer a richer context than executing a XProcPipeline by itself. This package offers functionalities like creating new jobs, querying for job status, deleting jobs or getting the messages produced during the pipeline execution. When creating jobs the xproc pipelines input/output operations are automatically managed creating and refactoring the URIs passed to the xproc engine. In order to get a full execution environment jobs can be created with a resource context which contains any extra file needed during the pipeline execution (e.g image files, extra css files, etc..)
